filter.title: Filter
filter.emptyInfo: No filters created yet. Click on the button on the right to add a new filter.
filter.editInfoAlternativeLanguage: Note: You have selected an alternative language. If you want to add a new filter, you must first select the default language.
filter.editInfoNewFilter: Note: The language selection has been temporarily disabled because you have currently added a new filter. Save or delete it to reactivate the language selection.

refresh-index-modal.title: Filter indexing
refresh-index-modal.infoText:
Indexing is required if filters of the custom-field type exist.

When creating/editing/deleting relevant filters or changing the free text fields in stores, indexing should be performed so that the filters are played out correctly in the storefront.
